name: BellBoy
description:
You play as Louis, a bellboy in a hotel who is getting hassled by his boss about the luggage build up in reception, control Louis and deliver luggage around the hotel as fast as you can before the time runs out... Do your best to beat your high score!

Controls

A , D - Move Left and Right

E - Interact

Q - Drop

By @mattsmiddy and @Squishyrock
